"Проклятье. Она права. Говно я, а не культист! Говорила мне мама - иди в пахари..." (с) Pathfinder: WotR

Отличная игра, атмосферные звуковые эффекты, особенно приятно играть знакомой компанией в кастомке - за эту возможность разработчикам отдельное спасибо. Где ещё можно увидеть, как Леона вешает на крюк в его же полицейском участке товарищ Майерс? Где ещё вы можете вычислить выжившего по звукам активного штопания? Наконец, где ещё фраза " ГДЕ ГЕНЕРАТОР???" станет настолько часто используемой, а на отдельных картах потеряются не только жертвы, но и убийца???

Игру рекомендую, 10 стонущих Леонов из 10.

I really like that every game has pretty much a different out come so far, and no two games are exactly the same. I've really enjoyed playing this game solo as well as with my friends. 适合新手的好游戏，简单易上手，操作流畅，画风清新。在风景明丽的名胜古迹中，体验和可靠大叔的趣味躲猫猫。技术不佳，还能享受专业道具理疗肩部，甚至在神明祝福中更上一层楼。强力推荐入手，除了服务器有时候有点小拉跨，总体不影响他的优秀游戏体验！

DONT PLAY THIS GAME. at the present moment cheaters are running rampant throughout this game and the devs clearly dont care. almost every match you play the killer will be running speed or wall hacks and devs refuse to hand out bans on people clearly hacking. on the other hand if you play as the killer and try to play legitimately you'll be thrown into a match with a full organized team of pros no matter what rank you might be. my advice is to save your money and buy a game actually worth buying, because this game is NOT worth the headaches and grief you will get from it.

Dead by Daylight, uno de los pocos juegos a los que le he echado tantas horas, 300 horas desde que salió el DLC de Halloween provocó que me enganchara su mecánica y jugabilidad tan atractiva, fue una forma bastante ocurrente de darle un vuelco al género del terror, en el que el trabajo en equipo es fundamental. Es un juego que busca en cada partida mantenerte tenso y en el que todos tus sentidos deben estar alerta en todo momento pensando en una estrategia de huida o de caza si vas de asesino/a. Con el paso de los años y con la llegada de Hellraiser se ve la dedicación que hay detrás de cada DLC que estrenan, un orgullo ver como ha escalado esto desde sus inicios <3
Bom porem tem alguns bugs
pp
POGGERS

Game is fun, but I'm not recommending it because of all the Microtransactions. If you are going to charge for these new characters and chapters then there shouldn't be so many MTX's. If let's say I'm buying the new Hellraiser DLC all his cool costumes should not be costing me even more money. Shouldn't be $5 for the character and some DLC even being up to $12 then on top of that $5-$10 per costume or accessory. Haven't played since the Halloween DLC and I'll probably play a few matches as Hellraiser, but all the money grubbing has really made me want to just uninstall and never touch the game again no matter what cool Horror character they get.

Now for the Review that doesn't involve DLC and MTX's

There are – and have been – asymmetric multiplayer games released over the years, with fairly middling results. Dead by Daylight has improved the niche by creating a product that balances simple gameplay with minimal downtime, and giving players plenty of depth to come back to again and again. It is – by far – the superior asymmetric multiplayer game to date. Dead by Daylight is a mix between an action and a horror survival game in which you will either be an innocent survivor or a cruel murderer where bloodbaths and the essence of slasher genre films will be the protagonists.

Pros
-------
- Fun and intense multiplayer
- Multiple maps with randomised elements
- Developers updating from week to week
- Range of characters enables different styles of play
- Being able to play as some of the Horror Genres most Iconic Characters

Cons
-------
- Balancing patches can sometimes feel one-sided
- No option to stay in lobby or continue playing with the same team after a game ends
- Generator repair mechanic is overly finnicky and difficult
- Killers are overpowered, allowing a skilled player to beat the survivors virtually every time
